name: Pigeonhole (plasmastarfish)
description:
It's a well-known fact in bird law that no three birds can sit in a single line (killing two birds with one stone is all well and good, but three is just ridiculous). Arrange your birds without forming a three-in-a-row in this reverse-match-three tile-based puzzler.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022. All code, images, and audio were made during the jam.
